welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ourense, where the charm of its historic architecture and the soothing hot springs await you. Take your time to explore this beautiful city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: La Casa Del Pulpo

restaurants.address: Calle JUAN DE AUSTRIA, 15, Bajo, 32005 Orense Galicia
